title: an extra $10 for the chroma?
body: ill take a refund without using a refund token.

replies.body: While the chroma is an option, the tickets gained from the pass missions can be used towards quite a few stuff.  Still, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're seeking a refund and our billing team will look into it for you!
